title: Acer Aspire Switch One 10 (Laptop + Tablet)
summary: With its brilliant new Acer Snap Hinge2, this trendy and compact 2-in-1 laptop transforms into four different devices, simply and incredibly smoothly. Add to that its long battery life, and you have a partner for serious work and play – the perfect blend of a laptop’s productivity and a tablet’s multimedia fun.Intel quad-core Windows 10 2GB RAM 500GB Hard HD IPS Multi Touch Screen1 year carry in warranty
